segments.text: I notice the water is just cascading over the sink, creating a huge puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, completely unaware of the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how much water is just going to waste like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so mischievous, taking those cookies without permission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is really taking a risk, standing on that stool like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting so eagerly for her cookie, it's cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long it will take for the woman to notice what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she doesn't slip on the wet floor and hurt herself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so serene, it's a stark contrast to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this scene is a perfect example of how life can be so full of surprises.
segments.speaker: PAR
